title: Implement Secure Login with Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a user, I want to login securely using multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure my account is protected from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: The MFA should include options like SMS, email, and app-based verification. The system must ensure no access without successful verification.
acceptance_criteria:
1. MFA is triggered upon login attempt.
2. User only gains access after successful MFA verification.
test_cases: Given a user logs in, When they complete the MFA step successfully, Then they should be logged into their account.

title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
description: As an admin, I want to define user roles and permissions, so that users can only access services relevant to their roles.
attributes_and_rules: Roles must include predefined and custom roles. Permissions based on roles should dictate service access levels.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can be assigned different roles.
2. Users can only access services within their assigned role permissions.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role logs in, When they attempt to access restricted services, Then they should be denied access based on their role.

title: Create Personalized Customer Dashboard
description: As a returning customer, I want a personalized dashboard displaying relevant services, so that I can quickly view and access the most important information.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should present widgets based on user profile data and eligibility. Real-time data updates are required.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays content based on user profile.
2. Information on the dashboard updates in real-time.
test_cases: Given a customer logs in, When their profile data is evaluated, Then the dashboard should show relevant widgets and real-time information.

title: Build Responsive UI Accessible Across Devices
description: As a user, I want to access the portal on different devices, so that I have a consistent experience regardless of device used.
attributes_and_rules: The interface should adapt to various screen sizes and resolutions. Compliance with accessibility standards is required.
acceptance_criteria:
1. UI adjusts to screen size and device type.
2. UI elements remain functional and accessible across devices.
test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal on different devices, When they perform various actions, Then the interface should be consistent and accessible.

title: Enable New Account Creation via Guided Workflows
description: As a potential customer, I want to open a new account using guided workflows, so that the process is easy and intuitive.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow should include auto-filled fields, progress tracking, and the ability to save and resume later.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can open accounts through guided workflows.
2. Customers can save and resume their progress.
test_cases: Given a potential customer begins the account opening process, When they fill out the form and save their progress, Then they should be able to resume later from where they left off.

title: Enable Secure Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to securely upload documents through the portal, so that my sensitive information is protected.
attributes_and_rules: Support for multiple file types and sizes. All uploads must be encrypted and validated.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can securely upload documents.
2. Documents are encrypted during transit and storage.
test_cases: Given a customer uploads a document, When the upload is complete, Then the document should be encrypted and validated.

title: Provide Real-Time Status Updates on Services
description: As a customer, I want to receive real-time updates on my service requests, so that I can stay informed about their status.
attributes_and_rules: Notifications should be available via email and portal alerts. Detailed statuses and timelines must be provided.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers receive real-time notifications about their requests.
2. Customers can view detailed statuses and timelines.
test_cases: Given a service request is submitted, When its status changes, Then the customer should receive a real-time notification update.

epic_title: Customer Interaction History and Activity Logs
title: Maintain Customer Interaction and Activity Logs
description: As a customer, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can track my activities and ensure everything is accurate.
attributes_and_rules: All activities must be logged securely. History view should be accessible and protected from unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customer interactions are logged securely.
2. Logs are accessible to customers while ensuring data protection.
test_cases: Given a customer performs actions in the portal, When they check their activity log, Then all interactions should be accurately recorded and displayed.

title: Integrate Portal with Core Banking System
description: As a technical user, I want the portal to be integrated with the core banking system, so that customer data and transactions are synchronized in real-time.
attributes_and_rules: APIs and middleware must provide secure and efficient data exchange. Fault tolerance and data security are mandatory.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Data synchronized between portal and core banking system in real-time.
2. Integration ensures fault tolerance and data security.
test_cases: Given the portal and core system are integrated, When a transaction occurs, Then customer data should be synchronized immediately and accurately.

title: Optimize Portal Database for Performance
description: As a technical user, I want the portal database optimized, so that it delivers high performance and reliability for user operations.
attributes_and_rules: The database should support high availability, efficient queries, and strong encryption.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Database achieves high performance and reliability.
2. Data is securely stored and queried efficiently.
test_cases: Given the database is set up, When user operations are performed, Then the database should handle queries efficiently and securely.

title: Implement End-to-End Security and Compliance
description: As a security administrator, I want the portal to have end-to-end security measures, so that customer data is consistently protected and compliant with regulations.
attributes_and_rules: Implement encryption, vulnerability scanning, and adherence to PCI DSS and GDPR standards. Regular audits and penetration tests are required.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Security measures are implemented and regularly audited.
2. The portal adheres to PCI DSS and GDPR standards.
test_cases: Given security measures are in place, When audits and penetration tests are conducted, Then there should be no vulnerabilities or compliance issues.
